p: A weighed quantity (1974.92 g) of the ground leaves was extracted with methanol by cold maceration for 48 h at room temperature (26–28 °C). The macerate was filtered using Whatman No. 1 filter paper and concentrated using a vacuum rotary evaporator at 40–60 °C. The obtained methanol extract of Schumanniophyton magnificum (MESM) stored in an air-tight plastic container in the refrigerator (4 °C) was used for the study.
